title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.14.0.2 发布
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2019-10-16 11:00 编辑 
测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。
如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
Minecraft 基岩版 1.14 仍未发布，1.14.0.2为其第2个测试版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

Fixes:bug修复：
修复了48个bugCrashes/Performance崩溃/性能
Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay修复了游玩时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could occur when breaking a crafting table修复了破坏工作台时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could sometimes be triggered by certain Honey Block states修复了可能由蜂蜜方块触发的崩溃问题UI Textures now load in more quickly when joining and leaving a world加入或退出存档时会更快地加载UI材质Fixed a crash that could sometimes happen after pressing any button during chat UI closing animation修复了关闭聊天界面时点击任意按钮后可能发生的崩溃问题

General常规
The main menu background (Cube Map) now matches that in the Java Edition将主菜单的背景界面（3D贴图）与Java版匹配Bee Nests now spawn in more types of tree, as they do in the Java Edition蜂巢可以自然生成在更多种类的树上，Java版也是如此Fixed a bug that could cause some models to appear incorrectly in the Character Creator修复了一个在角色创建器中会导致一些模型无法正确显示的问题Various tweaks and fixes to the Character Creator调整与优化角色创建器Fixed an issue that would sometimes cause the loading screen background to not show correctly when joining a split-screen multiplayer game修复了加入分屏游玩的存档时可能会导致载入界面背景无法正常显示的问题Fixed a navigation issue that could cause an incorrect focus change when choosing an option from the pause menu修复了从暂停菜单中更改设置时会导致应用设置不正常的导向问题Honey Blocks textures are now the same on Java and Bedrock蜂蜜方块的材质与Java版一样了Slime block textures are now the same on Java and Bedrock史莱姆方块的材质与Java版一样了Fixed an issue that was causing worn items to transfer between Character Creator models unexpectedly修复了在角色创建器模型中可能会导致穿戴的服饰突然变换的问题


Gameplay游玩
Breaking a Beehive while in creative mode will no longer drop the block as an item创造模式下破坏蜂箱会直接消失The Honeycomb block crafting recipe now matches Java, and can be crafted with 4 honeycomb items蜜脾块的合成配方现与Java版匹配，4个蜜脾即可制作The Honeycomb block now uses the stone block sound instead of the slime block sound (MCPE-53577)现在蜜脾块的音效与石头方块的一样，而不是史莱姆方块音效Green particles are now shown when crops get pollinated by Bees作物被蜜蜂授花粉时会有绿色粒子出现Pillager Patrols no longer spawn in the End or Nether dimensions (MCPE-51481)掠夺者巡逻队不会在下界和末地出现了Mob behaviour when jumping on Honey Blocks is now more consistent for all mobs将所有怪物在蜂蜜块上的弹跳行为匹配一致Slime Blocks and Honey Blocks no longer stick to each other when interacting through piston-mechanics史莱姆方块和蜂蜜方块使用活塞推动时不会黏在一起了Fixed an issue that could sometimes cause touch screen controls to become inverted (MCPE-50256)修复了轻触屏幕控件有时会反转控制的问题Pick Block now works correctly on Bees (MCPE-53445)蜜蜂怪物蛋现在可以被捡起来了Fixed the held item bobbing animation when moving in first person view (MCPE-51212)修复了第一人称视角中移动时手持物品的物品摆动动画异常的问题


Mobs怪物
Reduced the time that Bees take to search for a new hive when a hive is full缩减当蜂箱住满时蜜蜂寻找新蜂箱的时间Bees no longer try and find their way home if they end up in the Nether or the End dimension蜜蜂不会在下界和末地寻找回家的路了Bees can now be tempted and fed with two-high flowers可以用两格高的花来引诱和给蜜蜂喂食了Bees will now attack if a player harvests honey from the hive at night玩家在晚上从蜂箱收集蜂蜜时蜜蜂会攻击玩家Fixed a bug that was causing Bees to not get angry when their hive was harvested（接上一条）修复了蜜蜂不会攻击玩家的问题Bees now escape from the hive when it is on fire (MCPE-53609)修复了着火时蜜蜂不会逃离蜂箱的问题Changed return-to-home priority so that bees are more eager to go home when it's raining更改蜜蜂回家的优先顺序，下雨时会更快回家Bees no longer clip inside honey blocks when flying near them蜜蜂在蜂蜜块附近飞行时不会再夹在里面Bees now spawn only in blocks you can move through (instead of getting stuck inside leaves, for example)蜜蜂只会在可以穿过的方块中生成（为了不会卡在树叶里）Bees are now able to gather nectar from flowers that have been placed in the Nether蜜蜂现在可以从曾经种植在下界的花里采集蜂蜜了Bees now hover correctly over flowers, instead of beside them蜜蜂会正常悬停在花朵上方而不是旁边If a Bee's home hive is blocked, it will no longer hover endlessly outside the hive如果蜜蜂认家的蜂箱无法进入，它不会再外面一直游荡了Fixed an issue that was sometimes preventing Bees from entering hives that are not full修复了当蜂箱没满时蜜蜂没法进去的问题Baby Pigmen now hold their swords in their hands, rather than around their necks (MCPE-53454)修复了小猪人拿剑的模型“刺穿脖子”的问题


Items物品
Dragon heads now appear at the correct height (MCPE-53129)修复了龙头在方块上放置的高度不正确的问题

Graphical图形界面
Fixed a bug that was sometimes causing chests to become invisible (MCPE-52790)修复了箱子有时候会不显示的问题Held items no longer render incorrectly in front of the worn pumpkin vignette修复了手持的物品不会在南瓜前面正确渲染亮度的问题The block breaking animation will again show if a block is below water when the player is above如果玩家在水上，方块在水下，破坏方块的动画会正确显示The player's hand no longer disappears when gliding with Elytra (MCPE-53092)修复了用鞘翅飞行时手臂消失不见的问题


User Interface用户界面
Fixed an issue that could cause some UI flickering when navigating through the Character Creator修复了导向角色创建器时一些UI可能会狂闪的问题

Add-Ons and Script EngineAdd-Ons和脚本引擎
Fixed an issue with entity geometry that was causing some custom mob models to break修复了几何实体导致一些自定义的怪物模型损坏的问题Fixed an issue with particle billboarding that was causing them to appear flipped in the wrong direction修复了告示牌的粒子会导致牌子的方向发生180度翻转的问题Fix for scaling item in hand rendered items when the mob scale is non 1.0修复了怪物比例不是1.0时，手部渲染过的物品比例不正常的问题Fixed an issue with pivot points for custom geometry cube models修复了自定义的3D几何模型轴心点不正确的问题
